backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement tied to ValentinePage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining global light/dark color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ValentinePage as the root component.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Generates animated heart particles around a click point and self-cleans after completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the prefers-reduced-motion media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind global theme, animations, and heart-burst keyframes with reduced-motion fallbacks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Interactive Valentine page implementing collision-free evasive 'No' button logic, heart burst effects, and responsive repositioning.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state describing a Valentine web page, its features, issues with the evasive 'No' button, and requirements for fixes and theme elements.
